title: Lending to priority sector helps improve banks' asset quality: RBI economists
description: A study by RBI economists reveals that priority sector lending (PSL) improves banks' asset quality, especially after the asset quality review. The research, covering data from March 2006 to March 2023, highlights that PSL growth does not deteriorate asset quality and emphasizes the role of PSLCs in enhancing niche sector lending.
